Translations.Text: YA ne stanu poklonyat'sya tomu, chemu vy budete poklonyat'sya
i vy ne poklonyaytes' tomu, chemu ya budu poklonyat'sya
i ya ne poklonyayus' tomu, chemu vy poklonyalis'
i vy ne poklonyayetes' tomu, chemu ya budu poklonyat'sya
U vas - vasha vera, i u menya - moya vera
Kogda prishla pomoshch' Allakha i pobeda
i ty uvidel, kak lyudi vkhodyat v religiyu Allakha tolpami
to vosslav' khvaloy Gospoda svoyego i prosi u Nego proshcheniya! Poistine, On - obrashchayushchiysya
Pust' propadut obe ruki Abu Lakhaba, a sam on propal
Ne pomoglo yemu yego bogatstvo i to, chto on priobrel
Budet on goret' v ogne s plamenem
na sheye u neye - (tol'ko) verevka iz pal'movykh volokon
